***
### Advance Procurement Notice - Armoured Combat Support Vehicle (ACSV) Project

#### Background and Purpose

This Advanced Procurement Notice (APN) is issued by Defence Construction Canada (DCC) to provide potential design-builders with early access to the security clearance application process. The notice does not represent a formal bid solicitation.

#### Project Overview

The project aims to address infrastructure needs for maintenance and storage of Armoured Combat Support Vehicles (ACSV) at the 3rd Canadian Division Support Base (CDSB) Edmonton. The scope of work, if the project proceeds, will include:

* Concept development, design, and new construction of a 4,396m2 facility for Armoured Combat Support Vehicle
* Associated ancillary site works and utilities

#### Security Requirements

To be eligible for contract award, design-builders must hold a valid and active DESIGNATED ORGANIZATION SCREENING (DOS) granted or approved by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

#### Programme de Sûreté Industrielle (PSI)

DCC is providing design-builders early access to the security clearance application process through its Programme de Sûreté Industrielle (PSI). Design-builders should begin the security clearance application process by applying through DCC's PSI.

#### Sponsorship Process

Upon receipt of a sponsorship request application, DCC will review and complete a sponsorship request package. The package will be forwarded to the CSP, PWGSC, 30 calendar days prior to planned tender closing.

#### Important Notes

* There is no guarantee that the contract will proceed or that any security clearance will be granted.
* DCC does not provide any assurances or guarantees that a sponsorship request package or a security clearance application will be successful or result in the granting of the requested security clearance.
* Design-builders must cooperate with the CSP, PWGSC in a timely fashion to further the process.

#### Contact Information

For any questions regarding the sponsoring process through the PSI, please contact:

* Telephone Number: (613) 998-8974
* Email address: ISP.Sponsorship@dcc-cdc.gc.ca

For any questions relating to this Advance Procurement Notice, please contact:

* Brett Cooper, Defence Construction Canada
* Phone: (780) 266-1884
* Email: Brett.Cooper@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
